#misc 
# Description
One of the bunnies found a remarkable text that withstood all his decoding attempts.

Luckily, it was written on the back of a recipe, which seems to hold the answer to the solution.

``

Download the recipe below.
![](../Screenshots/Pasted%20image%2020240331101955.png)

# Solution
Since we have the recipe that generated the encoded output, if we do it on reverse then we should get back the flag.
![](../Screenshots/Pasted%20image%2020240331103513.png)

`he2024{Cyb3rch3f_cooks_the_b3st_d1nners_from_simple_1ngr1d13nts}`
